text:
Hey there, 2 questions :
1- Is it possible to sort “contents” by view in a Blog List using filter “sort” ? 
2- How can we use HubSpot Language Switcher on Blog ? it only works on Website Page and Landing Page but I would like to use it in a blog post or in a blog list 
Thanks a lot
I messed with a multi language blog with a coworker, I'll get back to you on that when I speak with him
